content.question: The function <math alttext="S"><semantics><mi>S</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="S open parentheses t close parentheses equals fraction numerator 500 , 000 over denominator 1 plus 0.4 e to the power of k t end exponent end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>S</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>500,000</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0.4</mn><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a constant. If <math alttext="S open parentheses 4 close parentheses equals 300 , 000"><semantics><mrow><mi>S</mi><mfenced><mn>4</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>300,000</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, what is the value of <math alttext="S open parentheses 12 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>S</mi><mfenced><mn>12</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?
